unitName: Health, wellbeing and social learning in primary contexts
description: This unit explores the complex nature of learners' health, wellbeing and social learning from the perspectives of the pre-service learners themselves and through an examination of the role that primary schools play in promoting children's health and wellbeing. Students explore factors that shape health, wellbeing and social learning. They engage with current public health, wellbeing and curriculum policy and apply their understandings to school program development.
